name: A. Minutes Before the New Year
statement: New Year is coming and you are excited to know how many minutes remain before the New Year. You know that currently the clock shows  hours and  minutes, where  and . Your task is to find the number of minutes before the New Year. You know that New Year comes when the clock shows  hours and  minutes.You have to answer  independent test cases.
input: The first line of the input contains one integer  () — the number of test cases. The following  lines describe test cases. The -th line contains the time as two integers  and  (, ). It is guaranteed that this time is  a midnight, i.e. the following two conditions can't be met at the same time:  and . It is guaranteed that both  and  are given without leading zeros.
output: For each test case, print the answer on it — the number of minutes before the New Year.
tutorial: In this problem we just need to print .
